title: Senior Manager, Enterprise Campaigns
summary: Led integrated enterprise campaigns and ABM programs for Service Cloud and key industries, aligning product marketing, sales, and events to drive pipeline and ACV.
highlights: Owned enterprise Service Cloud demand generation campaigns across Fortune 50 accounts.
Built integrated programs combining digital, events, BDR outreach, and executive briefings.
Authored ABM Center of Excellence playbooks and demand-gen methodologies.
Increased pipeline from target accounts by 30% year-over-year through propensity-led targeting.

title: Global Marketing Operations Practice Leader
summary: Built a data-driven demand gen reporting and enablement practice for global NGO and Education marketing teams, transforming spreadsheet reporting into scalable Tableau-based insights.
highlights: Designed and implemented full-funnel demand-gen reporting for ~95 marketers worldwide.
Migrated manual spreadsheet scorecards into Tableau, cutting reporting time from 4 days to 2 hours.
Led activation and training for Salesforce dashboards and campaign management best practices.
Drove a 76% YoY increase in marketing-sourced pipeline and 63% YoY ACV growth.
Directed a distributed team to realign strategy and operations, increasing lead gen by 150%.

title: Senior Principal Program Manager, Account-Based Marketing
summary: Built scalable ABM customer activation frameworks and lifecycle playbooks for global enterprise accounts, standardizing how field marketers orchestrate customer growth.
highlights: Designed the ABM Customer Activation framework in the Global Program Office.
Supported 200+ enterprise customers and 65+ field marketers with playbooks and campaign kits.
Contributed to roughly one-third of Red Hat’s global pipeline through ABM programs.
Standardized multi-product customer lifecycle playbooks for upsell and cross-sell.
Improved data hygiene and reduced churn by aggregating and operationalizing engagement data.

title: Director of Digital Marketing & ABM
summary: Owned unified digital, ABM, and marketing operations to drive marketing-sourced pipeline across ~300 target accounts, while standardizing data capture, attribution, and stack governance.
highlights: Global ABM lead and admin for Demandbase, Salesforce, and Qualified across 300 target accounts.
Redesigned site and content experiences to support verticalized, persona-based personalization.
Continuously optimized paid search and SEO through agency partnerships for higher conversion and influence.
Built data-driven campaigns in Marketo and paid social, lifting MQL-to-SQL conversion by ~180% YoY.
Served as primary admin for Salesforce, Demandbase, ZoomInfo, Marketo, Qualified, and WordPress.
Established a marketing operations practice including revamped lead scoring and attribution models.
Led and coached a team of three on building high-performing digital and analytical programs.
